Hi, I'm

B-DeshiDev an Indie Game Developer.

    Commercial:

    Control:Override

    Hack into a rogue AI and (ab)use the environment to solve physics-defying puzzles in Control:Override.

    Personal:

    MathMagician

    A short card based RPG where you need to use arithmetic to manipulate the flow of mana.

    Disconnected Yet Connected

    A short, narrative focused game around the theme of connection. Made for ECjam

    In Exchange For My Life

    A short prototype ARPG where you need to bet a portion of your life every time you cast a spell

    Nekuro Tactics

    A SRPG where you can possess and order only 1 party member to act every turn. Made for GMTK2020.

    Riskbreakers

    A simple endless survival game where you must balance risk and power. Made for LD-40.
